title:
A K&W Cafeteria located in Leland would be nice. Any chance of getting one?



An IHOP and/or Cracker Barrell in Leland would be great.  What\'s the chances of that?



Why did the Fishy Seafood Restaurant on Village Road in Leland close?  A good seafood restaurant in Leland is needed.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17187
